entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
